channel.title: Aim & Power Weapon Attributes
channel.description:
Been working on the combat formula lately and figured this might help someone in the future.
Weapons.txt has all attributes.
http://imgur.com/N8OOM6v http://i.imgur.com/N8OOM6v.png

item.title: Aim & Power Weapon Attributes
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

Zoso_:

How would this help someone in the future

When developing a combat formula I would hope that you would take weapon attributes into consideration. When you have a proper implementation you can use the math to create new items with the proper attributes as well. (For those servers that want to create dragon 2h or whatever)

The charts show an obvious pattern One of my favorite analysts is the
Long Swords
Aim : 8 10 16 20 22 31 49 Dragon: 72
Power: 8 10 16 16 22 31 49 Dragon: 72

22 + 22 - 31 = 13
31 + 31 - 49 = 13
49 + 49 - 72 = 26 (doubled to show how amazing the next tier is)

It won’t work with the lower tiers because that’s now how the formula (how the charts were made) works but it’s neat.

Read full topic
